helen.shapes

Class Shape

  • java.lang.Object
    • helen.shapes.Shape
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Circle, Line, Rectangle

    public abstract class Shape
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class used for Rectangle, Circle, and Line.
    Author:
    Helen Wang

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected double x 
      protected double y 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Shape(double x, double y)
      Sets the x and y as the upper left coordinates of the shape
      Shape(double x, double y, java.awt.Color strokeColour, java.awt.Color fillColour, int strokeWeight)
      Sets x, y as the upper left corner; sets the stroke/fillColours/strokeWeight to the arguments

    • Field Detail

      • x

        protected double x

      • y

        protected double y

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y)
        Sets the x and y as the upper left coordinates of the shape
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of upper left corner
        y - Y coordinate of upper left corner
        Postcondition:
        strokeColour and fill Colour are set to black and white respectively, and strokeWeight is set to 1

      • Shape

        public Shape(double x,
             double y,
             java.awt.Color strokeColour,
             java.awt.Color fillColour,
             int strokeWeight)
        Sets x, y as the upper left corner; sets the stroke/fillColours/strokeWeight to the arguments
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape
        y - Y coordinate of the upper left corner of the shape
        strokeColour - Colour of the border
        fillColour - Colour of the inside of the shape
        strokeWeight - The width of the stroke/border

    • Method Detail

      • calcArea

        public abstract double calcArea()
        calculates the area of the shape
        Returns:
        the positive value of the area as a decimal

      • calcPerimeter

        public abstract double calcPerimeter()
        calculates the perimeter of the shape
        Returns:
        returns the positive value of the perimeter as a decimal

      • isPointInside

        public abstract boolean isPointInside(double x,
                                      double y)
        checks if the point is inside the shape
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinate of the point
        y - Y coordinate of the point
        Returns:
        returns whether or not the point is in/on the shape

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        draws the shape with stroke colour, fill colour, and strokeWeight according to the constructor
        Parameters:
        drawer - PApplet object
        Precondition:
        object must have been initialised in the constructor
        Postcondition:
        object will be drawn according to its colours/strokeWeight

      • getX

        public double getX()
        Returns:
        returns the X coordinate of the upper left corner

      • getY

        public double getY()
        Returns:
        returns the Y coordinate of the upper left corner

      • moveTo

        public void moveTo(double x,
                   double y)
        moves the object to the new point by moving it's upper left corner
        Parameters:
        x - New x-coordinate of the upper left corner
        y - New y-coordinate of the upper left corner
        Postcondition:
        fields x, y, will be changed

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double x,
                   double y)
        moves the object by the specified x,y units
        Parameters:
        x - How much the object is moved horizontally
        y - How much the object is moved vertically
        Postcondition:
        fields x, y, will be changed

      • changeColour

        public abstract void changeColour(boolean isGrey)

      • setColour

        public void setColour(int r,
                      int g,
                      int b)
        sets the colour of the object
        Parameters:
        r - int value for red
        g - int value for green
        b - int value for blue
        Postcondition:
        changes fields r, g, b

      • setStrokeWeight

        public void setStrokeWeight(int weight)
        sets the strokeWeight to a new value
        Parameters:
        weight - new value for strokeWeight

      • getColour

        public int getColour(int choice)
        returns the current r g b values
        Parameters:
        choice - which value they want (1 is r, 2 is g, 3 is b)
        Returns:
        returns the corresponding value
        Precondition:
        must enter int between 1-3 to get a correct value
